body:
First off this isnt a spam thread dont lock it

Alriht my suggestion is to make the server only open on weekends becuase no one plays durng the week so its basically wasted money to keep the server up

title: Suggestion

replies.body: i don't think there's any hosting company with a weekends only option
replies.body_tagged: i don't think there's any hosting company with a weekends only option

replies.body: The server is most likely payed for monthly, since the hosting provider seems to be OVH. This host doesn't charge by how many resources is being used.
replies.body_tagged: The server is most likely payed for monthly, since the hosting provider seems to be OVH. This host doesn't charge by how many resources is being used.
